verses.verse: (Praising the LORD in His House at Night) A Song of Ascents. [1] Behold, bless the LORD, All you servants of the LORD, Who by night stand in the house of the LORD!
(Lev. 25:21; Deut. 28:8; Ps. 42:8) Lift up your hands in the sanctuary, And bless the LORD.
The LORD who made heaven and earth Bless you from Zion!
